New Records: Hield has made 12 of 16 3-pointers in his first two games, the most in NBA history for a player with a new team.
Key Match Events: Hield came off the bench midway through the first quarter with the Warriors trailing by nine and immediately hit a 3-pointer off a pass from Curry and followed it with a layup.
Trayce Jackson-Davis' inside shot made it 74-47 with 8:15 left in the third.
